column6: THE HEROIC AGE IS HERE! Who are the Secret Avengers?  Are they a covert team of heroes working the darkest corners of the globe to stop disaster? Are they part-spy, part-superhero? Are they XXXXXXX's newest idea to save the world...or all they all of the above?  A new era begins as Marvel's hottest team takes a 21st century twist! Rated T  ...$3.99
column8: | writer:Ed Brubaker | penciller:Mike Deodato | penciller:Marko Djurdjevic
